message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses a protocol for distributed ledger via sharding, which involves topics related to cryptography (cs.CR), distributed computing (cs.DC), data structures (cs.DS), networking and internet architecture (cs.NI), and systems and control (cs.SY). The paper specifically addresses the scalability and security issues in sharding-based protocols, which are relevant to all of these sub-categories. However, the emphasis on cryptography and distributed computing suggests that cs.CR and cs.DC are the most likely sub-categories.
